nodes.text: LothalNet was a vast grid of communications towers located on the planet Lothal. It coordinated air travel between the planet's scattered settlements and guided visitors to spaceports until it was supplanted by a more advanced Imperial network by the year 5 BBY. When LothalNet comm tower E-272, located in grid Q6 of the Western Zone, fell into disuse after the area was seized by the Empire, the thief Ezra Bridger took up residence in the tower.

LothalNet was first mentioned, albeit indirectly, in A New Hero, a young readers book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on August 5, 2014. It was later identified in Rebel Journal by Ezra Bridger, a young readers book written by Daniel Wallace as the in-universe journal of Ezra Bridger and released on October 21, 2014.
